byline.contributor: Vanessa Friedman contributed reporting from New York, Mark Scott from London and Paul Mozur from Hong Kong.

abstract: Apple will only sell Apple Watch in nine countries and exclusively through its own channels; is also inviting customers into its store to see, wear and feel the watch, strategy used by many luxury goods makers to create allure.
lead_paragraph: The Apple Watch will be sold in just nine countries and only through its own channels, entering the world in a different manner from that of the iPhone.

headline.main: Changing Tactics, Apple Promotes Watch as a Luxury Item
headline.print_headline: Changing Strategy, Apple Promotes Its New Watch as a Luxury Item

snippet: The Apple Watch will be sold in just nine countries and only through its own channels, entering the world in a different manner from that of the iPhone.
